# rux-tab-panels

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Events

| Event               | Description                                             | Type                                     |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `ruxRegisterPanels` | Emits a list of the Tab Panels that have been passed in | `CustomEvent<HTMLRuxTabPanelsElement[]>` |


## Slots

| Slot          | Description                         |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `"(default)"` | Used for instances of rux-tab-panel |
